thread.title_full: Arjun Kapoor is not coming back on Khatron Ke Khiladi; here's who will replace him : Reality TV, News - India Today

title: Arjun Kapoor is not coming back on Khatron Ke Khiladi; here's who will replace him : Reality TV, News - India Today
text:
Arjun Kapoor is not coming back on Khatron Ke Khiladi; here's who will replace him Khatron Ke Khiladi is back, and a former host will make a comeback on the show. IndiaToday.in | Posted by Parmita Uniyal Arjun Kapoor 
Actor Arjun Kapoor , who made his TV debut as a host for adventure-stunt reality show Khatron Ke Khiladi last year, will not be making a comeback on the show due to his packed schedule. 
"Arjun Kapoor hosted the reality show, Khatron Ke Khiladi last year. However this year he wont be able to host the show for the second time as his hands are full with three films," Arjun's spokesperson said. 
"Arjun will be shooting and promoting his two films, Half Girlfriend and Mubarakan back-to-back and he has another new film to be announced soon," he added. 
Also read: Khatron Ke Khiladi 7: Five reasons to watch Arjun Kapoor's debut show 
The actor had informed the makers in advance about the same. 
"He (Arjun) shares a fantastic relationship with Colors but he won't have adequate time this year to dedicate to the new season (of the show). Arjun had conveyed this to the channel well in advance so that they can find a suitable replacement of the host," the spokesperson said. 
Director Rohit Shetty is likely to return as a host for Khatron Ke Khiladi again. However, there is no official confirmation on this as yet. 
(With inputs from PTI) For more news from India Today, follow us on Twitter @indiatoday and on Facebook at facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
